column4: tritium hasn't been active for 8 hours :)

For which version of Ubuntu?
There is no proprietary driver support for that card.

no problem :)
You're probably thinking of gwibber, its in the repositories
it's like a girls name... i can't remember
gwibber?

'at your website' ? Its a microblogging client.
hm
i'll search later i'll tell ya
Its possible you were thinking of identica/laconica
identica!!!
can i use it at my website, like install one?

the backend is called laconica i beleive, you'd have to check their website for details, I don't see a distributed package in the archives.  Its not a twitter client though, its an open source clone.  The identica and twitter networks don't talk to each other.
